Translations.Text: Estr Pharaoh's popol dir Vol vi allow Moses his popol corrupt ter forsake vi your di? Li dir Ni kill their fil sxpar their daughters! Ni est mult powerful than ili est
Moses dir al his popol Streb di help steadfastly persevere Ter aparten al DI Li grants gxi whomever Li chooses His servants. ultimate victory aparten al des righteous
Ili dir Ni persekut antaux vi ven us kaj vi ven us. Li dir Your Lord annihilate your enemy establ vi ter tiam Li seg kiel vi behave
